overview:
Three Years of Experience in .com, .co.uk, .pk, industry, with extensive hands on experience of internet/web marketing with SEO (Search Engine Optimization) and Other Online Marketing Channels like Pay Per Click, Pay Per Lead, Social Media Marketing, E-Mail Marketing.

Most Recently Shahzaib Elahi has optimized and started Scube Solution and WorldofTrade.com that is at its excellence now and generating business. Also Shahzaib Elahi Working now Peanut labs last 1 year.

Three Years of hands on practice with Search Engine Optimization/Marketing, Understanding of major Search Engines and their Algorithms.. Identification of Search Engine Algorithm likes and dislikes.

  • Web performance tracking Competitor and Market Analyze.
  • Keywords optimization and Keyword ranking management. -(Google, Yahoo and Bing) o Submissions (Directories, Forums and Classifieds) -Strategizing Link Building and building Link Building Partnerships o APIs integration -Link Exchanging o One way relevant link partnerships o Blogging and Blog Commenting -Skilled in Using SEO Analytical and Web Master Tools -Google Adwords Advertising and Management -FaceBook, Twitter, LinkedIn and Stumble o Bookmarking and their integration..

SEO/SMO Business Consultancy Search Engine Optimization Social Media Optimization {online|on-line} Branding & {reputation|name} Management Keyword {research|analysis} & Analysis SEO Competitive Intelligence Strategy {web|net|internet}master Social Media Strategic {planning|designing|coming up with} {people|individuals|folks} Management Blogging Project Management {web|net|internet}
